00003 glm::mat4 Camera::SetPerspective(float fov, float aspectRatio, float near, float far)
00004 {
00005         m_fov = fov;
00006         m_aspectRatio = aspectRatio;
00007         m_nearPlane = near;
00008         m_farPlane = far;
00009 
00010         m_projectionMatrix = glm::perspective(m_fov, m_aspectRatio, m_nearPlane, m_farPlane);
00011 
00012         return m_projectionMatrix;
00013 }

00015 void Camera::PositionCamera(float positionX, float positionY, float positionZ, float yaw, float pitch)
00016 {
00017         m_position = glm::vec3(positionX, positionY, positionZ);
00018         m_yaw = yaw;
00019         m_pitch = pitch;
00020 }
00021 
00022 glm::mat4 Camera::GetRotationMatrix()
00023 {
00024         glm::mat4 rotationMatrix(0.5f);
00025 
00026         // Add the Pitch rotation along the x and y axis
00027         rotationMatrix = glm::rotate(rotationMatrix, glm::degrees(m_pitch), glm::vec3(1, 0, 0));
00028         rotationMatrix = glm::rotate(rotationMatrix, glm::degrees(m_yaw), glm::vec3(0, 1, 0));
00029 
00030         return rotationMatrix;
00031 }
00032 
00033 glm::mat4 Camera::GetViewMatrix()
00034 {
00035         // Return a view matrix by multiplying our rotation matrix by the inverse of a translation matrix
00036         return GetRotationMatrix() * glm::inverse(glm::translate(glm::mat4(), m_position));
00037 }
00038 
00039 glm::vec3 Camera::GetView()
00040 {
00041         // Looking down the negative z-axis.
00042         glm::vec4 viewVector = glm::inverse(GetRotationMatrix()) * glm::vec4(0, 0, -1, 1);
00043 
00044         return glm::vec3(viewVector);
00045 }
00046 
00047 glm::vec3 Camera::GetUp()
00048 {
00049         glm::vec4 upVector = glm::inverse(GetRotationMatrix()) * glm::vec4(0, 1, 0, 1);
00050 
00051         return glm::vec3(upVector);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void Camera::MoveCamera(float speed)
00055 {
00056         // Get our normalized view vector
00057         glm::vec3 viewVector = GetView();
00058 
00059         m_position.x += viewVector.x * speed;
00060         m_position.z += viewVector.z * speed;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Camera::Zoom(float yoffset)
00064 {
00065         // multiplication factor changes how fast scrolling in and out occurs
00066         int mf = 4;
00067 
00068         if (glm::degrees(m_fov) >= 1.0 && glm::degrees(m_fov) <= 61.0)
00069         {
00070                 float change = glm::degrees(m_fov);
00071                 change -= yoffset * mf;
00072                 m_fov = glm::radians(change);
00073         }
00074         if (glm::degrees(m_fov) <= 10.0)
00075                 m_fov = glm::radians(10.0);
00076         if (glm::degrees(m_fov) >= 61.0)
00077                 m_fov = glm::radians(60.0);
00078 
00079         m_distanceFromPlayer -= yoffset;
00080         m_projectionMatrix = glm::perspective(m_fov, m_aspectRatio, m_nearPlane, m_farPlane);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void Camera::ChangePitch(float yoffest)
00084 {
00085         // multiplication factor changes how fast pitch up and down occurs
00086         float mf = 0.01;
00087         float pitchChange = yoffest;
00088         m_pitch += pitchChange * mf;
00089 
00090         if (m_pitch > glm::radians(70.0))
00091                 m_pitch = glm::radians(70.0);
00092         if (m_pitch < glm::radians(1.0))
00093                 m_pitch = glm::radians(1.0);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Camera::ChangeAngleAroundPlayer(float xoffset)
00097 {
00098         // multiplication factor changes how fast pitch up and down occurs
00099         float mf = 0.1;
00100         float angleChange = xoffset * mf;
00101         m_angleAroundPlayer -= angleChange;
00102 
00103         float horizontalDistance = CalculateHorizontalDistance();
00104         float verticalDistance = CalculateVerticalDistance();
00105 
00106         CalculateCameraPosition(horizontalDistance, verticalDistance);
00107 }
00108 
00109 float Camera::CalculateHorizontalDistance()
00110 {
00111         return (float)m_distanceFromPlayer * glm::cos(m_pitch);
00112 }
00113 
00114 float Camera::CalculateVerticalDistance()
00115 {
00116         return (float)m_distanceFromPlayer * glm::sin(m_pitch);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void Camera::CalculateCameraPosition(float horizontalDistance, float verticalDistance)
00120 {
00121         float theta = m_playerRotation.y + m_angleAroundPlayer;
00122         float xoffset = horizontalDistance * glm::sin(glm::radians(theta));
00123         float zoffset = horizontalDistance * glm::cos(glm::radians(theta));
00124 
00125         m_position.x = m_playerPosition.x - xoffset;
00126         m_position.y = m_playerPosition.y + verticalDistance;
00127         m_position.z = m_playerPosition.z - zoffset;
00128 
00129         m_yaw = glm::radians(180 - (m_playerRotation.y + m_angleAroundPlayer)); 
00130 }

00132 void Camera::ParsePlayerInfo(glm::vec3& position, glm::vec3& rotation)
00133 {
00134         m_playerPosition = position;
00135         m_playerRotation = rotation;
00136 }
